name: Corki
title: the Daring Bombardier
shortBio: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He dedicated himself to the development of flying contraptions, leading an aerial defense force of seasoned veterans known as the Screaming Yipsnakes. Calm under fire, Corki patrols the skies around his adopted home, and has never encountered a problem that a good missile barrage couldn't solve.

skins.name: UFO Corki
skins.description: Everyone said this model wouldn't fly, but Corki's never let himself be discouraged by others being reasonable.

skins.name: Ice Toboggan Corki
skins.description: Having broken the land-speed record in most other vehicular sports, Corki has turned his attention to the ice lugeâ€”a momentum-based activity that doesn't require a state-of-the-art flying sled with a forward-mounted machine gun. He brought one anyway.

skins.name: Hot Rod Corki
skins.description: Your plane's sheeting was busted, so we replaced it with a bullet-resistant alloy, and four-cylinder external mounted coal engine. Plus we painted flames on the front. No extra charge.

skins.name: Urfrider Corki
skins.description: Defying all laws of physics, Corki rides Urf the Manatee into battle. With gatling guns ablazing, they charge headlong into the war against Urfwick and all other enemies who may threaten the existence of the peaceful and benevolent Urfs.

skins.name: Dragonwing Corki

chromas.name: Dragonwing Corki

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained from the 2018 Lunar Revel missions.

skins.description: Corki's pit crew made sure to outfit him with a special ship for Lunar Revel, emblazoned with the visage of a dragon to scare off evil spirits. It has been further modified to spray bullets and fire explosivesâ€¦ presumably also to scare off evil spirits.

skins.name: Fnatic Corki
skins.description: Honoring LaMiaZeaLoT's winning performance as Corki during the 2011 World Championship.

skins.name: Arcade Corki
skins.description: The fearless protagonist of a 1980s top-down shooter, Corki resists Veigar's battle bosses the same way he resists being shot down by thousands of glowing bulletsâ€”move fast, and shoot everything before it shoots him.

skins.name: Corgi Corki

chromas.name: Corgi Corki

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

skins.description: A dog trainer with some impractical ideas about canine aerodynamics, Corki has entered the world's foremost pet show with a flight-enabled Pembroke Welsh Corgi. Why has he done this? What does he hope to gain? Is he really a Yordle, or just a very small man? These are all important questions.

skins.name: Astronaut Corki

chromas.name: Astronaut Corki

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Commander Corki is both a veteran of the space program and its fearless leader. After traveling to a new and undiscovered planet with his intrepid crew, he befriended a stray alien meep that became his assistant and ally in exploring the galaxy. Together they fly, holding off the encroaching invasion of evil purple meeps that threaten the cosmos.

passive.name: Hextech Munitions
passive.description: A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is dealt as bonus <trueDamage>true damage</trueDamage>.

spells.name: Phosphorus Bomb
spells.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
spells.dynamicDescription: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. The area and champions hit are revealed for @RevealDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Valkyrie
spells.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
spells.dynamicDescription: Corki flies over and scorches a path, burning it for @TrailDuration@ seconds. Enemies in the fire take up to <magicDamage>@MaximumDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> over the duration.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Gatling Gun
spells.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
spells.dynamicDescription: Corki fires a gatling gun in front of him, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage> over @SprayDuration@ seconds and shredding up to <scaleArmor>@ShredMax*-1@ Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Missile Barrage
spells.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Corki fires a missile that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing @RSmallMissileDamage@ physical damage to surrounding enemies. Every third missile instead deals @RBigMissileDamage@ physical damage.

This Ability has up to @MaxAmmoTOOLTIP@ charges. Basic attacks against champions reduce the time between charges by @AttackRefund@ seconds on hit.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
